PrecisReappointment of HEATHER MUNROE-BLUM, O.C., O.Q., of Montr√©al, Quebec, as a director of the board of directors of the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and her designation as Chairperson of the board of directors of the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board, effective October 27, 2020.
